title: Personal data scraping project
description: Developed a data pipeline using Python (requests, pandas) to scrape, process, and analyze local supermarket product data, implementing custom algorithms to identify optimal food choices based on nutritional value and cost.

title: Developing 'sAIm'
description: Fine-tuning a large language model (LLM) on personal text corpus to explore personalized agent capabilities, potential biases, and data privacy considerations.

title: Reinforcement Learning Agent Development
description: Implemented and evaluated a Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) agent within a custom Gymnasium environment as part of university coursework. Ongoing extension with variants of PPO/other SOTA RL algorithms.

title: Competing in Kaggle's BirdCLEF 2024 Challenge
description: Research Code Competition on Bird Sound Classification

title: Assessing Artificial Sentience: Are we responsible?
How do mice vary in the amount of past information they use to make decisions under uncertainty?
Research Sequence on 'Hebbian Natural Abstractions'
description: Blog Project with Jan Hendrik Kirchner
